multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is the main feature of a content library?

choicegroup.choice: To display a subset of specified content, typically questions, in a randomised order
To act as a repository for mixed media and course assets Whilst it does have a repository aspect, it is not the main place to hold course content as it sits above the course level

To display a subset of specified content based on what you have previously answered Unfortunately, a content library can not be used for adaptive learning methods as it can not support dependency relationships between content
To be all things to all people and more I like the way you think! But sadly, no.
